title.label: Great game but it costs money...

content.label: This game is one of  he best I’ve ever played, but it unfortunately costs money to keep going. This is truly disappointing because it is an awesome game.

I’ve only just downloaded it, but it’s really nice. The graphics are great, the gameplay is fun and humorous. And it’s free. Which is always a bonus. And then I realized it was made by the same fantastic people that made Pin Out and Smash Hit. Two games I greatly love.
First when i saw this game I thought it will be like boring or something but when I downloaded its really fun like im surprised

I hated this game, you get to like the second checkpoint then when you log off you have to start all the way from the beginning and then they make you try to buy their premium thing. I just hated this app do not recommend.

I just had to finish. It took me months of off and on playing to get to the last level only to realize that I had not acquired enough time to finish. I started the game again from level one and began racking up more time just so I could finish. I just beat the game and now am looking forward to trying to beat my score. Definitely a game that provides plenty of opportunities to beat yourself time and time again. I recommend very few games but I definitely recommend this one.
Great game super fun
Was great in it's day, but hasn't been updated in 3 years and looks pretty terrible in the iPhone X/XS/XR.
Haven’t had so much fun in a long time!!!

Ok so the game is great and all, and I love playing it. But there’s just one problem. It’s when you reach the next checkpoint, you have to start ALL THE WAY OVER from the beginning and that seriously pisses me off
Sometimes it doesn’t make sense and then you fail but over all this is a good game
It’s an interesting concept, but you have to pay for premium to get checkpoints and it’s annoying at times
Super fun for the first few tries, then it’s frustrating and boring.

Look, I like this game but there’s just one issue that I have with this game along some of your other games: Paying for checkpoints! One of the most basic video game features and we have to pay for that? Would if I have to go to bed? I wake up having to start all over! I understand that you need the money and all, but this is ridiculous. Maybe you could put ads over checkpoints and give us that choice! If anything your premium should be get checkpoints free and not get checkpoints. Please change this in a later update of the game because to me, this is just downright wrong.

Great app, but basically the entire interface is ruined when there is no support for the new iPhones. Especially since Apple only manufactures iPhones with the new “all screen” design. Please fix this so I can enjoy this game again!
Does not commute is very fun because of the part where you can’t even blame anybody.  The controls, time, and haunting stories is very entertaining for me.
App crashes on launch
I played this game and thought it was great.  It has a great design and I had so much fun playing it.  Although it is kind of short.  I love this game so much so please update it to make it longer.

The core game is amazing fun but the game does not save any of your progress unless you get the paid version.  So if you spend 20 minutes moving ahead you’ll lose all that progress once you quit.  I immediately deleted the app once I discovered that and I’m very disappointed because the game is really fun.  I just don’t want to have to repeat everything I’ve already done in order to play it.
Love the game. The add on is a great addition. THAT is the way that ads should Be marketed. But anyway. Great game, hope to see some more “mediocre” content

I’m digging this developer, PinOut is fun as well. I like the goofy storylines for each car; fun graphics and easy controls. 
The only thing I would like to see is being able to watch all your cars going at once when you finish a level. Keep up the good work!

It was a fun and enjoyable game, it’s was a breath of fresh air from all those crappy and repetitive hyper games, plus it didn’t seem to try and milk me for money, for ones I was actually enjoying a game until you run out of time for the first time. It’s costs about two dollars to respawn at a checkpoint. And to think I found a game that I thought wasn’t about the money. It just goes to show developers care more about making money than developing a good game. I deleted the game and will no longer play games by this developer. If you enjoyed it though I’m glad, it was fun.
Good but i don’t like the seconds
Fun game

I like the premise of the game but the controls are too loose. By that I mean the area that you should click on for a turn is not consistent. I noticed throughout the game that the car wouldn’t turn even though I was pressing on the same spot. Also, at times the car goes off screen with no way of knowing how to get it back.

It’s super fun but is pretty hard. It took me a while to master it but after bout a day I got it down. If you play it and think it’s too hard just keep trying. The other reviews that say it doesn’t load are not true for me. There are absolutely no lags. Best game ever
Just like me.

title.label: CANT GET PASS THROUG THE LEVELS

content.label: EVERY TIME I LOSS I HAVE TO RESTRART?! THATS RUDE! AND THERES TIME? WHAT THE HELL! IM JUST AN 8 YEAR OLD AND THIS?! IDOITS FIX THIS!
Not worth the in-app purchase. It’s a bit too  difficult and the lack of meta-checkpoints makes the game quickly become tedious to play.

This game is most definitely NOT short. If you think you have beaten this game in a few hours or even a few days, you are mistaken. You may have gotten to the end, but that’s NOT the end of the fun. This game is deep, deep, DEEP! There are more ways to improve your times than you will EVER find. Can you run every vehicle on turbo - without crashing? Do you know some vehicles can "fly"? Do you know the best way to get the hidden 10-second time bonus on the first level? Oh, you didn't know there was a hidden 10-second time bonus on the first level?? There are two. Search FB and you'll find lots of hints, tips & tricks you never imagined. You have _months_ of driving fun ahead of you!
The perfect mix of Arrested Development and Smashy Road, the only questionable thing about this game is who wrote this masterpiece.

This game is pretty fun at first. It tells you a short paragraph then gives you a challenge. But I kinda got bored the first 10 minutes. You just do the same exact throng throughout the whole entire game. But everyone should try it. It’s not that bad.
Genial

title.label: Very fun game — and great sales policy

content.label: I have played hours and hours of a game from this publisher that involves breaking glass. Don’t know if I’m allowed to talk about other games.  I’ve been getting increasingly annoyed with being made to sit through ads in other games and I figured I ought to look at what else these folks have done. Saw the reviews of this and figured it was worth a look. This is a lot of fun, both in game mechanics and the story. I’m not through the whole game, but I can already say it has replay value. There is skill and strategy involved. And the money I paid?  No ads! Happy to give them the money. Will watch to see what they do next.
I play this game for hours on end it’s that great!!!!!
This is the best IOS game I’ve ever played. So relaxing but intriguing at the same time😊
Worlds Best Car Game I've played!!

title.label: Super fun whether you’re good or bad

content.label: This game can be tough but it’s super fun and polished whether you’re good or bad at it and worth the purchase in my opinion

This is not just a review on Pin Out. This is a review on Mediocre and it’s apparent fondness for a single, all-mighty in-app purchase.

Looking at the video for Does Not Commute, as well as the one for Smash Hit and the one for Pin Out was great fun so naturally I thought it would be fun to actually play the games. Was I right? Yes and no...

All of Mediocre’s games are far beyond mediocre in design and gameplay. The problem is with their business tactics. They’re excellent. Too excellent. You see, each Mediocre game has a premium mode you have to pay for. Only once you sacrifice $1.99 on said premium mode, as I realized too late, can you access your hard-earned checkpoints among various other things. And only when you access the checkpoints do you really have much of a chance at getting past Checkpoint 2 in this game alone (provided of course that you have my skill level).

VERDICT: If you don’t think 2 dollars is that much to spend on a video game, keep an eye out for Mediocre. They will satisfy only if you fork over money.

I understand having to start over without having premium, at this point it raises the stakes and makes the game what it is. No sweat. But when I went to the menu to turn off the audio and tried to go back to where I just was, I was met by a “pay 2.99 for checkpoints” menu.

Very very frustrating. No mention I would lose my progress, no way to alter the audio without leaving, and thus I lost my progress because of cheapness. Very stingy and not appriciated.

The game, however, rises above this nonsense and makes up for it was much replay ability. Worth 5 stars, but lost one to greed.

When I first got this game it started out good and I liked it, but after you run out of time and you finished a checkpoint you go back to the beginning of the game. Unless you buy premium witch is 3 dollars to get all checkpoints unlocked. And isn’t it supposed to be a story? You should be able to go back to the checkpoint you left off at. I wouldn’t recommend this game to anyone, but if you want this to happen go ahead. 👎🏻
This game is a creative time game and it takes strategy and I think it should be more popular and should be put on front page so more people can can download. Just an amazing game.
AMAZING!!
bored very fast

title.label: Fun, but wish the whole game was free

content.label: Yeah
El juego está muy bien es muy entretenido pero cansa que El Progreso no se guarda siempre hay que comenzar de cero si uno no se hace premiun. eso es una pena
hilarious and haunting. i love this game. just wish there wasn’t a 2.99 fee to have checkpoints,, makes the game much less enjoyable

title.label: What I think and how to help

content.label: Why is because that I do not have money for a prime thing so can you make an effort to make it easier for me to play because that wold help you because then if I start to get the hang of it I will tell my friends and then that is better for you guys.

This game is fun to play, but if you want to save your progress you have to spend $3. What the heck! I just lost all my progress cause I didn’t want to pay for it! Don’t buy this game. Creator of this game, please write back to me and try to defend deleting people’s progress if they don’t pay. If you don’t write back, I know you are a coward and you are afraid to admit that you’re wrong. Toodles! :(😫
There is definitely not enough time
I enjoy the game and the humorous character stories of each commuter. But can you please update the graphics to fit the iPhone X screen.
